Names of Jesus.quote: "And his name shall be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace." (Isaiah 9:6)

Divine Titles.quote: "I am the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End." (Revelation 22:13)

Human Identity.quote: "And the Word became flesh and dwelt among us." (John 1:14)

Divine Sonship.quote: "This is my beloved Son, with whom I am well pleased." (Matthew 3:17)

Messianic Role.quote: "You are the Christ, the Son of the living God." (Matthew 16:16)

Salvific Mission.quote: "For God so loved the world that he gave his only Son." (John 3:16)

Healing Ministry.quote: "He went about doing good and healing all who were oppressed." (Acts 10:38)

Human Nature.quote: "For we do not have a high priest who is unable to sympathize with our weaknesses." (Hebrews 4:15)

Sacrificial Role.quote: "Behold, the Lamb of God, who takes away the sin of the world!" (John 1:29)

Resurrection Power.quote: "I am the resurrection and the life." (John 11:25)

Spiritual Authority.quote: "All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me." (Matthew 28:18)

Mediatorial Role.quote: "For there is one God, and there is one mediator between God and men." (1 Timothy 2:5)

Divine Wisdom.quote: "Christ, in whom are hidden all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge." (Colossians 2:3)

Pastoral Identity.quote: "I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep." (John 10:11)

Prophetic Office.quote: "This is Jesus, the prophet from Nazareth of Galilee." (Matthew 21:11)

Priestly Function.quote: "You are a priest forever, after the order of Melchizedek." (Hebrews 7:17)

Kingly Authority.quote: "King of kings and Lord of lords." (Revelation 19:16)

Divine Light.quote: "I am the light of the world." (John 8:12)

Living Word.quote: "In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God." (John 1:1)

Divine Presence.quote: "And behold, I am with you always, to the end of the age." (Matthew 28:20)

Redemptive Work.quote: "Christ redeemed us from the curse of the law." (Galatians 3:13)

Universal Judge.quote: "He has fixed a day on which he will judge the world in righteousness." (Acts 17:31)

Second Coming.quote: "This Jesus...will come in the same way as you saw him go into heaven." (Acts 1:11)

Cosmic Role.quote: "All things were created through him and for him." (Colossians 1:16)

Divine Love.quote: "Greater love has no one than this, that someone lay down his life for his friends." (John 15:13)

Divine Victory.quote: "Death is swallowed up in victory." (1 Corinthians 15:54)
